channel.title: Kelly Block
channel.description: Recent news about Kelly Block, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Enjoyed spending the day with @saskcattlemens and guests on their media tour learning more about our innovative beef industry here in SK.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Saskatchewan, harvest fields and big sky! We are so blessed to live in such a beautiful province. http://t.co/N6SCWykoIS

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Just spent an amazing evening with the graduates of the Praxis School of Entrepreneurship 2013. Best of luck. http://t.co/fTLP18CLpG

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Just getting acquainted with my new grandson, Ben. Born July 8, 2013. He's awesome! http://t.co/l1YkJ390cF

item.title: Mentioned by Stockhouse
item.description:
Member of Parliament Kelly Block Honours Canada's Veterans
SASKATOON, June 22, 2013 /CNW/ - On behalf of the Honourable Steven Blaney, Minister of Veterans Affairs and Minister for La Francophonie, Kelly Block, Member of Parliament for Saskatoon-Rosetown-Biggar, today joined members of the Montgomery ...
